home.desc1: I be a scallywag from France, and officially the most chill buccaneer ye'll ever meet, arr!
home.desc2: I be learnin' to develop on the Web seas and Apple ports. I also be practicin' me UI and graphic design skills, savvy?

languages.title: Languages
languages.desc: I speak English and French like a true sea dog, be proficient in Spanish and Chinese, and be learnin' Russian, arr!

links.socialDesc: Me social plunders and contact methods :3

wallpapers.title: Wallpapers
wallpapers.desc: Wallpapers for any ship or shore.

playlists.streamDesc: Where I stream me sea shanties:

creators.choose: Choose a tool, ye scurvy dog...

toolbox.desc1: Toolbox be the one-stop plunder shop fer all me resources and apps, arr!
toolbox.desc2: Here, ye can find apps, tools, and more, all in one app that ye can add straight to yer home harbor.

languages.betaNotice: This here feature be in beta, savvy?
languages.errorNotice: Translations might be cursed with errors.
languages.foundError: Found an error in the translations, ye scallywag?

starhop.title: Starhop
starhop.description: A dreamy infinite platformer on the high seas: hop between glowing platforms, snag starlight tokens, and dodge the tiny red sea creatures, arr!
starhop.controls: Controls: Tap/click or press Space to hop across the waves.
starhop.metaDesc: A tiny pastel platformer hidden as a treasure map.
starhop.hud: Hop across glowin' platforms, grab tokens, and dodge the red scallywags.
starhop.statusReady: Tap or press Space to start yer journey, matey
starhop.statusRetry: Walk the plank! Tap or press Space to try again
starhop.gameOver: Ye've been sent to Davy Jones' Locker

error.label: Shiver me timbers!
error.message404: We couldn't find that page, but we did find a tiny hidden pirate treasure game.
error.messageDefault: Try again or sail back to port.
